1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old orphan who lives in a careless orphanage.

Jack is a massive fan of the of the Oscar nominated, English actress Florence Pugh (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm6073955/) She has starred in such movies as Little Women, Midsommar, Fighting For My Family And Black Widow. You love everything about her. Her cute face, her gorgeous figure, her sense of humour, her beautiful sculpted legs and HER FEET (you have a foot fetish)

You wish you can leave this place and be with Florence Pugh. One night you are actually desperate enough to wish on a star and wish that you can be with her and you don’t care how (even though you should).

The next morning you wake up in a strange envoirmemt....
1.title: Shrunk

choices: She Wakes Up Before You Can Make A Decision
Her FICTIONAL Boyfriend Enters The Room
11.content:
Jack realise that he is the size of an ant and his no longer at the orphanage. He panics until he starts hearing loud snoring sound.

Jack turns around and see the face of FLORENCE PUGH.

Jack: Holy shit I can’t believe what’s happening I’m actually in front of Florence Pugh, but when I made the wish I didn’t want to be tiny.

Jack obverses Florence’s body as he see she is sleeping on her front naked with her breast squished against the bed.

Jack: what should I do?.....
11.title: On Florence’s Bed While She Sleeps

info.brief_description: You have shrunk and must survive the unaware giant Florence Pugh PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who gets mysteriously shrunk and end up in The life of his crush, actress Florence Pugh

RULES:
No Deaths
Keep It Unaware (If Found You Are A Bug Or Toy)
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
Keep It Focus On Florence Pugh Only (She Can Have Sex With A Guy But That’s It)
Describe What She Looks Like Or Wearing (Of Use Images)
